title: WTB: T205 Gibson (Sweet Caporal, Polar Bear, American Beauty)
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: WTB: T205 Gibson (Sweet Caporal, Polar Bear, American Beauty)
posts.post_content:
Morning everyone,

My T205 Gibson back run is missing Sweet Caporal, Polar Bear and American Beauty backs. I'm sure the AB back is a long shot, but what are the chances somebody has a decent PB or SC backed Gibson for sale?

Doesn't matter if it's raw or graded. Looking for something mid-grade. I don't mind some wear, no holes, and prefer no paper loss, but if it's subtle, I don't mind.

Post in the thread or PM me, please.

Thanks for looking!

Richard.
